newsitem.title: USA: AT&T declines comment on SBC deal.
newsitem.headline: AT&T declines comment on SBC deal.

text.p: AT&T Corp declined to comment early Tuesday on a report that it is in merger talks with SBC Communications Inc, a regional bell powerhouse, in a deal valued at $50 billion.
"As a matter of company policy we don't comment on rumours or speculation," a spokeswoman told Reuters.
A report in the Wall Street Journal's Tuesday edition said the two telecommunications companies are in the midst of merger talks that appear to have grown more serious recently.
SBC Communications only recently closed its $16.7 billion acquisition of Pacific Telesis.
